description: Left-to-right pipeline flow occupying the middle band of the slide. **Flow (left to right):** (1) Gray rounded box labeled 'Input:' containing bold question text and a question-mark icon at bottom-left. (2) Solid arrow to a document-stack + database line-icon pair labeled 'Search internal documents' above and 'Internal Documents: Policies, Guidelines, Procedures' below. (3) Solid arrow to a brain-handoff line-icon labeled 'Hand Knowledge / Context to LLM'. (4) Solid arrow to a circuit-chip line-icon labeled 'Generation' above and 'LLM' in bold below. (5) Solid arrow to a gray rounded box labeled 'Output:' containing bold answer text referencing a specific policy clause. **Bottom zone** uses the standard definition + takeaway layout. Left third: dotted-border definition box. Right two-thirds: three stacked text blocks — 'Without RAG:' (negative framing), 'With RAG:' (positive framing), and 'Leader's Insight:' (strategic takeaway) with bold emphasis on key terms.

Left-to-right process chain with trigger, steps, and outcome. **Trigger (far left):** Black filled rounded square with dotted outer border containing a white email/notification icon, labeled 'Invoice is 3 days past due' in bold below. Thin arrow exits right. **Five sequential steps:** Each step is a line-icon (no container box) with a numbered bold label below: (1) document-review icon / 'Check payment history & credit profile', (2) funnel-checkmark icon / 'Select follow-up strategy', (3) envelope icon / 'Send payment reminder', (4) database-ledger icon / 'Log activity in ERP', (5) person-escalation icon / 'Escalate or schedule next action'. Thin solid arrows connect each step. **Centre badge below chain:** Black filled rounded rectangle with robot/circuit icon left and bold white 'AI Agents' text right, framed by small decorative circuit nodes. **Outcome (far right):** Three lines each prefixed by a purple checkmark: 'DSO reduced', 'Less human intervention', 'X min saved'. Thin arrow from last step to outcome. **Bottom-left:** Standard dotted-border definition box.

Single large outer rectangle with thin black border spanning nearly full slide width. Section subtitle 'OVERVIEW' in small caps above the grid. **Internal structure:** 3-column × 3-row grid with thin black dividers. **Left column (narrow, single tall cell):** 'CONTEXT' header, purple subtitle 'Clarify why this AI initiative matters.', italic guiding question below. **Centre column (wide, three stacked rows):** Top: 'DEVELOPMENT' — purple subtitle about data-to-value, italic question with bold keywords (data, models, deployment). Middle: 'CAPABILITIES' — purple subtitle about enablers, italic question with bold keywords (people, processes, technologies). Bottom: 'GUARDRAILS' — purple subtitle about safety/compliance, italic question with bold keywords (governance, risk, compliance). **Right column (medium width):** Column border tapers to a rightward-pointing triangular point, forming an arrow silhouette. Top half: 'IMPACT' — purple subtitle about measurement, italic question with bold 'measurable, sustained business impact'. Bottom half: 'INSIGHTS' — purple subtitle about continuous improvement, italic question with bold 'continuous improvement and responsible scaling'. **Styling:** No fill colours — purely black-line grid on white. Framework-template aesthetic.

Three equally-sized standard cards in a horizontal row with spacing. **Card structure (repeated ×3):** Number badge top-left (1, 2, 3). Centre-top line-icon: Card 1 stacked-discs/database, Card 2 circuit-chip/processor, Card 3 cloud-upload/deployment. Bold uppercase title ('DATA', 'MODEL', 'DEPLOYMENT'). Bold role label ('The foundation.', 'The engine.', 'The delivery.') followed by description text. Bottom: lavender rounded rectangle containing a purple italic guiding question. **Connectors:** Thin purple right-pointing arrows between cards at vertical centre of gap. **Below cards:** Two centred quotation lines — '"Data without a model is just storage."' and '"A model without deployment is just a science experiment."'

Four-phase horizontal timeline with no containing box. Subtitle in small caps: 'A GENERIC VIEW ON THE PHASE OF (INNOVATION) PROJECTS'. **Phase structure:** Each phase has a bold black title on a horizontal baseline ('Context', 'PoC 1..N', 'Pilot 1..N', 'Ramp-Up') and a purple subtitle directly below ('Clarity', 'Validation', 'De-Risking', 'Benefit Realization'). Below each subtitle: detailed description text covering key questions (Context references SCQA; PoC covers Desirability/Feasibility/Viability as bold sub-labels; Pilot covers scaling and funding; Ramp-Up covers rollout and governance). **Transition elements:** Thin dotted vertical separator lines between phases. Between PoC and Pilot: two open circles (unfilled, thin black stroke) above the phase titles with small curved looping arrows suggesting iteration. **INSIGHTS labels:** Purple bold 'INSIGHTS' appears above each transition point (three instances), connected by thin lines forming a stepped path that rises across the timeline. **Entry point:** Small downward arrow enters 'Context' from above-left. Layout is sparse and text-heavy — circles and INSIGHTS labels are the only graphic elements.

Four-node pinwheel/clover shape centred on the slide. Four large circles in a 2×2 grid connected by an organic hourglass/bowtie form that pinches at centre, creating a continuous flowing silhouette. **Node positions and fills:** Top-left: purple/violet gradient — gear-warning line-icon. Top-right: dark charcoal/black — warning-triangle/network line-icon. Bottom-left: light warm gray — people-network line-icon. Bottom-right: steel blue/slate — layered-figure/incognito line-icon. Each icon sits inside a gray inner circle within its node. Central connecting shape uses gradient fills blending between adjacent node colours. **Labels (outside the shape):** Each node has bold black title and one-line description on its outer side: 'Operational Risk' / 'When AI doesn't work as expected', 'Cyber Risks' / 'When AI is exploited or attacked', 'Third Party & Vendor Risk' / 'When someone else's AI becomes your problem', 'Shadow AI' / 'When ungoverned AI creates blind spots'. No arrows or connectors beyond the organic central shape.

Four gradient cards side by side in a horizontal row with small gaps. Each uses the gradient card variant with protruding icon circle. **Card contents (left to right):** Card 1 (purple gradient): gear-with-warning icon, 'Operational Risk', model accuracy degradation scenario, consequence: fraud model degrades 95% to 60%. Card 2 (dark charcoal gradient): warning-triangle icon, 'Cyber Risk', prompt injection and data poisoning scenario, consequence: bot reveals internal policies. Card 3 (medium gray gradient): people-network icon, 'Vendor Risk', black-box vendor dependency scenario, consequence: vendor under cyber attack or API down. Card 4 (steel blue gradient): layered-figure/incognito icon, 'Shadow AI', ungoverned tool usage scenario, consequence: employee pastes GDPR data into GPT. **Text structure per card:** Bold white title, bold 'What it means:' section with descriptive paragraph, bold 'Consequence:' section with concrete example. All text white on dark backgrounds.

Split layout: two side-by-side regions. **Left half:** Tall light gray rounded rectangle containing two text blocks. Block 1: bold 'Step 1: Generate Use Cases' followed by paragraph about brainstorming AI applications, referencing 'AI Value Canvas' in bold. Block 2: bold 'Step 2: Plot on a 2×2 and Prioritise' in purple, followed by paragraph about prioritising by Impact and feasibility with bold keywords. **Right half:** 2×2 quadrant matrix with thin black axis lines. Y-axis: 'Impact (Business Value)' in bold at top. X-axis: 'Feasibility' in bold at right. Top-right quadrant: dotted-border rectangle with purple text 'Automate First'. Bottom-left quadrant: dotted-border rectangle with purple text 'Low Priority'. Other two quadrants empty/unlabelled. Axes meet at centre with clean right-angle intersection. Matrix is a blank template — no data points, grid lines, or icons.

Five pill cards in a horizontal row with small gaps. All uniform light gray fill. **Card contents (left to right):** Card 1: database/filter icon (purple), 'Data', 'Do we have it – and can we use it?', number '1'. Card 2: scales/balance icon (purple), 'Decisions', 'What does it decide – and can we explain why?', number '2'. Card 3: bar-chart/trend icon (purple), 'Measurement', 'How will we know it's working?', number '3'. Card 4: chain-link/key icon (purple), 'Ownership', 'Who's accountable after go-live?', number '4'. Card 5: lightning-bolt icon (purple), 'Failure', 'What happens when it breaks?', number '5'. Each card has the concave inset icon circle at top, bold black category title centred, regular-weight guiding question below, and oversized bold number anchored at bottom. No connectors between cards — independent set.
